content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my son and he told me "look up there dad!" and i did. i was facing east as the object came from a north eastern direction of travel. there was an elongated object (quite big) moving silently across the sky at the height of the clouds which are pretty low out here in nebraska. it had no wings and was heading in a south east direction right above lincoln. it went through or behind a patch of clouds and i didn't see it for a brief time and especially at the speed it was going i judged that it must have paused for a moment when behind or in the clouds. then i seen it again continuing along it's original course of travel. it must have been about sixty to eighty feet long and possibly thirty to forty feet wide. it was well proportioned and even in it's length and depth but more in length. there was no contrail or chemtrail behind it. it must have been traveling about 80 to 100 mph. mostly blue sky with some perfectly white clouds. 81 degrees outside with 9 mph winds coming from the south and visibility at 10.0 miles. just two days ago we had two brief tornadoes hit lincoln with one above my apartment complex and landing few blocks away. the other one at 27th and o streets.
content.summary: Elongated silent 60 to 80 foot object moves across sky.

content.detailedDescription:
it started in late apil and ended in june . may being the highlight of my sightings. i wittnessed three flying saucer's at first then up to fifteen do air combat manuvers in the sky's over my home at beale junction above beale air force base with two fighter jets from the airbase. im seventeen years old. i'm helping my mother in her restaurant and service station. it was in the afternoon, there was a few people at the counter eating. there suddenly was a loud jet noise coming right at us. every one ran out side just in time to see two jet aircraft t33's from beale turn up into a steep climb headed right for three silver in color flying saucers. the flying saucers were in a tight group milling around each other. the jets got up close to them and they took off with lightning speed, one went north with a jet right close behind it. the other jet chased one off to the west. the other one went straight up out of sight. this was the beginning of many a late night events. in may of 1959 beale air force base was turned into a bombing and gunnery range. for the last year and a half i have been writting my story about these amazing events. a new mufon field investigator ( tim doran ) has been working with me on on my sightings for the last year now, i have given him much detail and drawings on my case. i have even supplied him with a notorized wittnessed document.
it hase been ready to send to the state director for over a month now. 

my story is true in every detail.

sincerly,   john b. mullican
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three flying saucers and two fighter jets  manuevering over my home.

content.detailedDescription:
I was deer hunting with my father which at the time i was about 12 years old but very much in to military aircraft and flight in general so i was very framilar with all of the know aircraft at the time.  

it was just about an hour before dusk when my father had sat me down in a spot to watch over a hill for deer and in this spot i had a good view of the west sky through an opening in the trees and it was fall so there wasnt any leaves on the trees.  after he sat me down he walked up the hill from me about 50 yards to watch a field in the opposite direction.  we had were there for maybe 30 minutes when i had started to get bored and took a look at the sky.  the first thing i saw were these two craft moving north and they appeared to be about one of theyre own length apart.  after about 15 seconds of moving they stopped briefly and the lead craft turned at a 45 degree angle and ascended in two the clouds.  then the second craft moved into the lead crafts place and did the same thing.  i will not say how far away or big these craft were because i didnt have a point of reference but i did have a clear view of them and was certain of shape and characturistics the displayed which did not seem to be normal.  right after they disapeared i became scared and ran up the hill to get my father who didnt witness any of this and we left.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Metallic disk shaped with red and pale yellowish white lights blinking around the outer edge

content.detailedDescription: We were ...Ahhh.. hmmm wait a minute is that a quarter....Ummm ...Ohhh yeah it was insane we were um ...Wow did you see that n she was like ya dude its soooo big n i was like ...Um oh yeah well it was big red ball on fire ummm well thats it later
content.summary: Unbelievable event witnessed by hundreds of people

content.detailedDescription: I was at work (i work on the surface part of an underground coal mine) standing at my bosses truck. talking with him and the dozer man.When i was looking at the darking sky to see what stars i can see at the time. when form a north-east direction a small medium sized orb like object. came moving slowly over are location. it was silent no noise at all. the object changed colors form white to green. moved kind of eratic at times. object dissipered after about 5 min. over the horizon.I thought it was an airplane until it started changing colors and no sound what so ever. i was kind of shocked for i havent seen anything i couldnt explain since i was a kid and saw another orb like object that just vanished into thin air.
content.summary: Small sphere-star like object  white in color then turning a greenish color over time then back to white

content.detailedDescription: I did not see any object, but thought it worth reporting the incident.  at about six pm while watching tv and having dinner, my aunt and i heard what sounding like fighter jets go just above the house.  we took notice, but didn't think much about it at the time.  within two to three hours either the battery or electrical systems failed on three cars.  at just after six, my cousin was unable to start her car.  at about eight pm, another family member and a friend were also unable to start their cars. after hearing these stories, i just had the feeling these events were ufo related.  i thought it was important enough to report it to your organization.
content.summary: After a jet fly -over there was an effect on the electrical system of three cars

content.detailedDescription:
On june 12th, 2008 i was driving my bus west bound on belmont ave. in chicago.  i caught a red  (2-1/2 min.) stop light on ashland ave.
i looked through my windshield and saw a bright white light in the sky. at first i thought it was a plane, but i realized there were no flashing lights where the wings should be. i continued to watch the object which appeared to be stationary in the sky. as i stared i saw it move slightly north and realized it had changed position and was now facing me.  i saw it was not moving and realized it was a large v shaped object with white lights down each side. again i looked for flashing lights, there weren't any. i kept staring even as the passengers were boarding. i again thought maybe i was seeing things and tried to find a fixed point in the sky to see if the object would cross it. suddenly it moved east.  if i was to approximate a distance i would say about 8 inches if i held a 12 in. ruler straight out and to the sky. it stopped, and the white lights began to fade into a gray then black. i thought it would disappear, but suddenly the color turned into a stop light green and just hung in the sky.  i started rolling down the street again and the object fade from view behind the bus.  four blocks later on damen ave., to my surprise, the object again was in the windshield of the bus, hanging in the sky. i watched the lights once again turn from white to green and not move. i remember thinking while the lights were white that they seemed to be in blocks as if windows. i have no idea why i thought that. when they started changing color they did not go horizontally across the side but vertically so i could still see the white at the bottom turn into grey then black then bam! into green. there were very high light clouds in the sky. i realized later the object was muich larger than a plane or helicopter. the v shape was so perfectly surrouding by the lights there was no center light, they went down the outside and seemed to meet perfectly at the front end point.  as i drove home that evening i kept watching the sky for it to reappear but i didn't see it again.  when it moved each time, i almost felt as if it was in answer to my question "did it move or not?"  each time i questioned myself it moved.  i thought that was very creepy.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: V shaped object spotted in chicago 6-12-08 at 1922 hours.

content.detailedDescription: They moved almost as it they were playing chase with each other ... they would fly southeast - northwest and it seemed like they were covering 10's of miles in a split second ... lots of zig zagging patterns... then they would dissapear for a second and then show up instantly in another part of the sky ... it was not a spotlite because there were no lights showing up from the ground... i have seen this twice within a two year period in the same area ... it was in the western skies outside of brady ... the first time i saw it i had two friends with me and they saw it too ... then the next time i saw it there about 6 of us
content.summary: 3 to 4 red orbs - looked like red stars moving in eratic formation

content.detailedDescription: Then shot across the road and dissappered in an instant .... it dissappeared without a trail .. we were driving in a truck on a dark highway in central/west texas
content.summary: Super bright light in oval shape hovered overhead for a few seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down union st and look up and saw the craft stared at it forat least for afew minutes used building for a guide to see if was moving and it was not it blended with sky and clounds i watch it for a number of minutes look down for a second and it was gone.
content.summary: It was blue bottom snowwhite top blended with clounds

content.detailedDescription:
Hi me one more time i don't know how investigator work in this case. but i put in my ufo experience and tryed to find easy ways after weeks of no respons! i don't want to loose hope. i wonder if we will ever find what where looking for like this? still intrusted in being contacted still have what mufon might be looking for and like i sed in my last writing this is not a joke!
please contact me lets talk thank you.
content.summary: Have alien images in object

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on deck alone this time, around 8 eastern time, taped an odd dark boomerang cloud at the corner of my roof whooting a grey beam across the sky..It went behind my house then sudenly 3 or 4 black crafts appeared flying together i video taped them straight to this v shaped thing in the sky.. i kept taping and more were entering and leaving... incredible.. can someone tell me wtf is happening to me... i posted the ufo over altoona the other day on here..With the vortex and sparkles. email if you have any clue. this thing they were flying in and out of was the same color of my other video and was up there forever, not moving.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw 3 or more black and white orbish crafts make a bee line to a chevron shaped mothership that had others entering and leaving, see video

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother whent outside to smoke a cigarette in the driveway when a sudden glare of light appeared in the sky very low to the groung then the glare reduced to a small and dimmer light we both entered the street  and when we did the light became very bright again then reduced to a dimmer light once again object slowly started moving in are direction  we started walking towards it so we could get a good look at what we were seeing we kept saying to each other is that a ufo while walking towards it once it passed over our heads we could see all the different lights and that it was so close to us and we didnt her any noise like plane engines we knew it wasnt a plane there was many lights when it passed over us and it had many flashing red lights then moved passed us and whent off into the distance behind trees with no sound or anything then i came in and wrote you guys (my feelings were excited shocked intense moments)(my brothers feelings scared shocked amused)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Sudden glare of object then got dimn then became bright again slowly moved no sound lots of light white and red glowing

content.detailedDescription:
My friend who is a former commercial airline pilot(age 46) and i (age 42) were talking out in my backyard near the house at night when he looked up and asked "do you see that?". i immedaity looked up to see what looked like a shooting star rapidly moving from north/east to south/west. it looked to me to be pale white and about as bright as a bright star. my friend said it looked to have a red color. the sky was very clear. i soon realized that this moving object or light did not leave any streak, trail, or fire or smoke behind it. it did not seemt to be a meteor. it was almost straight overhead at about 80 degrees above the horizon. i then began to ask myself if this could be a sattelite although i had never seen a sattellite move anywhere near as fast as this was travelling. i think it was travelling very fast although i am not sure how larger or how high the light was. we both felt that it was high up in the atmosphere possibly in space though. 
about 2 seconds after looking at this i then thought " if this is someting out of the ordinary and not a sattellite then maybe it will do somehing odd".
 just then the light appeared to decelerate and change course to  arc in a more easterly direction. it did not stop though and then seemd to accelerate and curve back to the west into its original line of flight.

then it quickly faded out as it seemd to picked up speed although it was still up in the sky overhead. it was a clear sky and did not pass behind any trees. we heard no noise at any time or nor did we see any associated other lights attached to it or away from it. it did not blink or flash. neither of us could offer an explanation that seemed to fit. we both though it was definately odd.  felt that it was something under some sort of controlled flight and either it was closer than we thought or was far away and if so it had moved with a high rate of speed.
content.summary: Starlike rapidly moving that changed course, slowed down and then accelerated witnessed by my friend and i

content.detailedDescription: I came outside to talk to my husband who was working in the yard and looked up in the sky as i always do.  i noticed only one bright 'star' in the nw sky.  the sun had already set but the sky was still light so no other stars were visible...Only the moon.  i got my orion binoculars and looked at the 'star' and noticed that it was an oval bright white with light greenish and pinkish colors.  the oval was in a vertical position.  my husband and i looked at it for about 10 minutes and decided it must be a planet.  i was going to go inside and look on the internet to see if i could find out what it was.  then my husband and i noticed, (with our naked eyes), that it started fading.  i looked through the binoculars again and could see that it was sparking or sparkling like fireworks do when they are falling.  it seemed to drop slightly and then slowly faded out.  there was no sound and not a cloud in the sky.
content.summary: Bright star-like light in nw sky stationary and then sparkled and faded out.

content.detailedDescription:
I had gotten up from the couch and as i stood up i saw a large commercial jet in the sky in my window right above my head. i live on the 7th floor and it was very low and if it were any lower i could have probably hitched a ride. as i looked up and saw this, this plane was coming in heading west towards ohare. this is a normal everyday occurrance living just miles from the airport. my attention then went to a bright orange ball of light hovering in the sky in front of me about 2 blocks away facing west. i thought at first "where did that planet come from"? thinking i had not noticed this before. as i watched the light it  did not move but the commercial airliner was getting closer to this object, yet a bit overhead. then i realised that all the planes that usually i see in the west are further back in the sky. then i went to get my camera. as i lifted the camera and could even get it up to my eyes this ball of light started to sparkle like a firecracker and it lit up and turned into a tansparent orange square which then turned into a pin of light and just disappeared into nothing. when the object turned into the transparent square of orange light i could see through it. when the object went into itself, the square going into a pin of light, it looked like water going down a drain so fast like a vortex. 
still in disbeleive i continued to watch for a plane,iss, bird, anything that could explain this. i could find nothing. there was no noise and skies were fairly clear. it happened just before dark so the sky was a turquoise blue.
content.summary: Bright orange ball off light that imploded into itself and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I have not talked much about this since it happened 31 years ago. it
was summer in 1977 at about 11:45 pm. i was 14 at the time. i was
spending the evening with friends camping out in my parents back yard
in a tent. as with most kids that age we were horsing around quite a
bit...When suddenly we were startled by a strange pulsating, buzzing or humming
sound coming from a nearby field. we peeked our heads out of the
tent to see what the noise was all about, only to see a strange craft
hovering in a field not too far away. i lived in surrey, b.C. at the time, not far away from blaine washington...About 95 miles from seattle. i lived in an area that for the
most part was dense bush...Tall 150' cedar trees all around. what we
saw was a large (at least several football fields long or longer) delta wing craft
hovering completely still hanging in the air, with about +/- 12 pale white pulsating lights on one side of the wing. there were aproximately 12 -14
witnesses to this event including my parents and many neighbors as well. what was
strange and eerie about it, was the way it just hung in the sky with
those pulsating lights that would go bright and then dim and then
bright and so on. it made a low humming/buzzing sound that seemed to pulse as well. at one point the lights dimmed almost completely out ,like on a dimmer switch, and then back again.
one thing i remember quite clearly about it was, when it started to move again, it had an energy discharge off one of the wings...It looked like very
bright white (almost molten metalic)shards of glass breaking off, only it was an
energy discharge of some kind...And then the thing took off, slowly at first...And then in a
blink and at unbelievable speed it was gone. 

it was about 1/3 to 1/2 mile away and about 1500 feet above the ground. the event lasted about 15 - 20 minutes. it was never reported. this past christmas i was talking to my dad about it and he remembers it quite clearly as well, and he remembered the direction it took off. i have had two other encounters as well. but this one was by far up close and very personal. 


fyi, i am presently employed as an engineering technologist in the construction industry and my iq has been tested at 127 on the low end and as high as 140. visual spacial perception was off the charts on my iq test. test administered was the  adult weschler iq test.
content.summary: Several football fields long or longer delta wing craft

content.detailedDescription:
My husband, our roommate and i were at a concert at the starlight theatre, an outdoor venue in kansas city.  the show had been going for awhile and dusk was approaching.  it was a mostly clear night, with some sparse clouds that would pass over occasionally.  during one of the songs, i glanced up (as i am always trying to watch the sky) and noticed a bright white light that resembled the shape or appearance of a star, but was most definitely within our atmosphere.  i nudged my roommate so he would look up and see it.  my husband was away from his seat at the time.  we watched it pass over us, beginning at my right and moving to my left.  (i am unfamiliar with which direction we faced, so i cannot provide that information.)  as it moved it varied in size/brightness, at some points being about the size of venus as it appears from earth and getting as bright as approximately three times that size.  we both watched carefully to look for a shape or to see if it was a reflection of the setting sun on a plane or some other "normal" object.  that did not appear to be the case.  there were no blinking or colored lights on the object.  since it had been awhile since i last saw an unidentified object, i was fairly excited to watch it and determine its origin.

later during the concert, all three of us saw another object of the same description pass over in the same manner, although i believe it moved the opposite way, i.E. left to right.  in one of the cases, i watched the object disappear behind some clouds perhaps 40 degrees above the horizon and it did not reappear.  in the other case, i witnessed the light dim in brightness, and when it was about 30 degrees above the horizon, it simply went out altogether and did not light back up.  i cannot recall which ending went with which sighting and i do not want to guess and provide possibly incorrect information.  also, during the second sighting, my roommate pointed out the object to the people in the row behind us and they too watched it go by.  we didn't converse with them but they didn't disagree when our roommate said "that's not a plane!"
content.summary: Star-like objects crossed sky, varying in brightness

content.detailedDescription: I live just outside tyler and last evening i saw something way off in the sky, for hours i watched it.   i reported that, too.  anyways, i was watching the tonight show and across the lake from me there is a marshy area and then a ranch-ish looking property w/ lots of acreage.  i saw a blinking light in the sky first which looked like what i'd seen the previous night.  that light was way in the sky but it was across the lake se from me and then, and i couldn't see it very well, but i definitely saw a low, closer hovering light fairly dim in the trees more to the left next to the property and then what i thought might be people out on the property with flashlights - there were lights as if from a flashlight or helicopter surveying the ground and i couldn't tell what i saw it wasn't very clear but it was a streak of some low to the ground animal back and forth.  i thought maybe it was a dog at first, but it was way too fast - maybe a mountain lion?  it caught my attention, but i wasn't startled until the light in the trees dimmed and then flew across several properties and was changing  color to red like a laser pointer or something.  but then it would light up again in dim white and it just floated around from place to place.  i got kind of nervous when a red light got in front of my house, i woke my husband who was on the sofa and he also saw the red light.  it didn't move, it just stayed still from what i saw, but he'd talked me into watching tv instead of freaking myself out and later he said he'd seen it move.  we went to bed after him dismissing me and telling me it's some kid w/ a laser pointer.  i read for a bit to calm my mind and when i turned the light off to go to sleep - through the blinds in a room completely on the other side of the house facing west there was a very, very bright light that was hovering in the wooded area outside our house.  i woke my husband up again and he agreed he could see it and although he'll never admit it could be anything other than something explainable i could tell he got a little spooked.  he kept whispering loud - "ok, so what do you want me to do? i see it, i see it".  the light would change from very bright white to dimmer so you could barely see it and then brighten up again and as it would brighten a bunch of tiny little colored lights would blink so fast - red blue green.   i saw this light at around 12:45 and it lasted a little over an hour.  it moved very slowly all around and lowered into the trees and i heard noises like low whistles best way i can describe it was a soft high pitched noise between flute and a whistle.  i had trouble sleeping but nothing else happened after the thing left.  i didn't move to another window - when it was out of my eyeshot, i just let it go.  it was so bright the lights from it were coming in our window and it was like a headlights that were moving around the room depending on where this thing was positioned and how dim or bright it got.
content.summary: It changed from being hard to view to being very bright and then colored lights would ripple through the middle and around quickly.

content.detailedDescription:
I was vacationing in japan. on march 11 2008 at 9:05 a.M., i saw, in a sunny morning over kyoto north, japan, something in the sky. it never moved, not an inch, and had a cloud texture with something colorful in one of the top sides(right side), but very fade.
the first impression i had, is that it was the moon. and why is that ?... because of the contrast the moon makes when it's blue sky.
there were some people around, but i was the first to see it and told the others.

i observed the object for 5-10 minutes maximum, and 20-30 minutes after, i observed it again in another angle (not much different from the first) for 1 minute maximum, but with nothing different from the first sight. in all the time the object didn't moved, it was absolute still. there was nothing in the area flying. the sky was all clear.
an hour later i think it was gone. i never saw it moved or disappear.

i used a cybershot t-10 with 7.2 megapixels.

more detailed information in :

http://www.Ufocasebook.Com/2008b/kyotojapan.Html

thank you
content.summary: It never moved, not an inch, and had a cloud texture with something colorful in one of the top sides(right side), but very fade.

content.detailedDescription: I've been wanting to share this experience for a very long time but have been reluctant to do so until i came across this forum. in 1967 my father, mother, baby sister; and me were returning from visiting an uncle in the soundview section of the bronx. as we walked east on the westbound side of bruckner blvd. and approached the intersection of beach ave. and bruckner blvd. we saw people looking out and up from the apartment building on the west side of beach ave. they were pointing up. my family and i looked up and saw a disc shaped object glimmering gold and silver in color spanning approximately 90 feet in width across the blvd. the object was approximately 80feet high in the air and the top half of the object was spinning slowly in a clockwise direction while the bottom half appeared to be ratcheting in the opposite direction. the center of the object was surrounded by a series of large round lights that rotated clockwise while changing from red to green to blue to white. i stood almost directly underneath the object and looking up i marveled at the magnificent colors and under-structure of this object. the underneath was a maze of complex piping and components that i have to be honest i could not even begin to describe in a manner that would make any sense. the object was completely silent.  after watching this object for approximately ten minutes or so my father seemed to suddenly get spooked and called to me to move away from the object and we continued to walk towards our home. i looked back, my perspective now from north to south on beach ave., and saw that there were large arched shaped (what appeared to be) ports or windows on the very top of the object. as we walked further away i felt a strange sense of attraction coming from the object almost as if it were somehow ever so slightly pulling me back. needless to say that experience more than 40 years ago left me hoping, to no avail, that i would see it once again.
content.summary: Disc hovering over bruckner boulevard in nyc

content.detailedDescription:
I felt a prompting within myself to open the front door and take a look at the night and sky. at first, i wasn't going to because i'd done that just before i'd eaten, about 20 min. before. it's not unusual for me to go out and look at the sky, moon, stars, etc before bed. but the prompting was there. i opened the door without turning on porch light, so i could see more. i stepped the maybe 7' from my door to the yard. i realized a brilliant (like a diamond bright) small ball of light was headed right to me from my right side. i had been obscured by a thick privet bush until i stepped past it to yard from patio. the light hesitated, with a slight dip downward, right in front of me,(as if "it" saw me)! i felt life from it, not machine, by the way...
...My face upturned in awe..It was only a couple of feet from me and about 2' above my head...Then it zoomed upwards a few feet higher and streaked toward the large tree to my left...I walked further out to see if i could see it still moving somewhere, but i couldn't. i ask out loud, god, what was that? maybe there really are fairies, after all? people, i'm 59, not prone to hysteria, and have never experienced anything like this before. there is no creature could look and move like that...Unless it was some kind of angel hurrying on a mission!
hehehe i was not afraid. has anyone else ever experienced tiny balls of brilliant light that sparkled like diamonds? it moved so smoothly and no sound at all. i felt i experienced a great mystery. i also sensed that i wasn't "supposed" to have seen this. i live on an extremely dark farm market road way out in the country where there are no city lights to interfere with sky-viewing. another thing i noticed was that before this happened and i went outside, the neighbor's outside dog was barking, but whining as she kinda barked. weird. when i went out, my dog came also, and he looked up also and saw it, but he seemed worried and confused.
content.summary: One brilliant light streaked right in front of me from e, 2' above my head level and dipped, then continued to streak a bit higher toward w where a tree is, in total silence

content.detailedDescription: I can't remember the date exactly, i just know that it was in the beginning of 2004.  i remember that because i was living with my grandmother at the time.  i was home with her and i was finishing my business in the bathroom when i heard her yell for me.  i ran to her screened in porch panicked because i thought she had fallen or something.  when i got to the porch she was standing at the front door looking up.  puzzled i walked over to her and she pointed into the sky and asked, "whats that?"  i looked up and to my amazement i saw a triangle shape craft with the tips squared off.  there were  lights on each tip and in the middle was a glowing light.  the colors from this light were amazing.  in fact they were hypnotic because the colors were almost irredescent except that it wasn't.  it is hard to describe.  they were distinct colors and yet they weren't.  the craft flew over her house on the north side of kokomo.  i couldn't believe no one else was outside seeing this.  the sun was setting for the day since it was still winter but it was bright enough so that i could see that the craft was a dark grey color.  almost like the color of gun metal.  the craft also emitted a hum.  like an electrical hum.  it sounded like high voltage power lines except a little louder.  i finally answered her and said," granny thats a ufo".  she said, "thats what i thought it was."  we have talked about it several times since then.  we have told our family and they of course roll their eyes at us.  i'd love to know if someone else saw this thing in the winter of 2004 over kokomo.  i'm going to upload a picture i found from another ufo sight because it is exactly what i saw, except without the lights.  the shape of the craft is exactly like the one we say though.
content.summary: Flying triangle over kokomo

content.detailedDescription:
Viewed se of oswestry, this "dot" moved faster than what i have observed a "shooting star" would. it would cross a large distance then stop dead still for a second and performed various random upward/downward, and spiralling motions, disappearing momentarily on occassions, as if blotted by the light cirrus clouds. it performed many of these random movements over the same area for a period of 15 min's until i lost sight of it, at about 23.15hrs. it was a hazy pink colour, which appeared undiminished, and constant in all aspects of size and colour at whatever altitude or plane i saw it. there were aeroplanes visible at the same time, but they were distinguisable by their flashing lights. it made no noise.
my initial thoughts were that it was a laser, but these were dispelled when the object could clearly be seen in "open", clear sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star sized pink dot

content.detailedDescription: It was the evening time on june 5th 2008 and my friend and i were driving back home from ohio to arizona. we ran into some nasty weather in oklahoma probably an hour or two out of okc. at one point it seemed a funnel/tornado was forming so we used a cell phone to take a picture of it. once we looked at the photo on the phone later we noticed a disc like object hovering in the sky. i thought it could be a scratch or something, but when i zoomed in it looked like something in the sky. my friend and i have been showing everyone this photo as we are curious to what it is. the first photo is the orignal photo, and the second one i cropped around the object so you can see it better.
content.summary: A photo we took of a funnel starting to form during some nasty weather shows a disc flying in the sky. we didn't notice until we looked at the photo (camera phone).
content.locationName: Not sure (middle of no wh, Oklahoma

content.detailedDescription: I work second shift from 330 tillmidnight. i come home and watch activity up in the sky at night and see with binoculars.The craft is shaped like an oval giving off a pulsating whitish lime color and traveling at a high rate of speed. i have been in the aerospace business for 18 years and never seen anything like this. i tracked the ufo over our neighborhood and i lost it when it sped off. the ufo lights like to blend its self at night with the stars so it cant be dectected when it is hovering. about an half hour later i was relooking up in the sky i saw the object fixed in position and it didnt move. i looked up and it seemed it was observing me. then it took off at a highrate of speed over lake erie. last week i saw 2 ufos traveling together back to the lake. i know one thing in the aerospace business all commercial craft have to keep all 3 lights on but this craft is just one solid color.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo traveling from north to south over lake erie i

content.detailedDescription: i was 2/3rds over the kingston rhinecliff bridge headed towards dutchess county(east). as i scanned the horizon i saw this black cigar shaped craft descending towards the wsw at a 30 degree angle. it stopped for a second then went straight down rather quickly below the hill/treeline about 2 or 3 miles ese of my position. i estimate about a mile or so e or ese of rhinebeck,ny. i drove around that area to see if i could see it again or find someone that had with no luck. on arriving home i got on my ham radio and asked around locally if anyone had seen or heard anything, with no luck. just the usual ''what have you been smoking over there" comments. when i called the rhinebeck state police barracks (a trooper lucas answered)they were a bit more diplomatic when i asked if any ufo's had been reported that morning. saying "no, but we will certainly keep our eyes open..."
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Black cigar, or disc seen on edge, close to horizon descending at 30 degrees then stopped for a second and dropped straight down behind hill...

content.detailedDescription: While in las vegas on vacation in the early morning hours (appx. 1am or so) we were on the strip walking.  we happened to look up and saw a triangle shaped object slowly passing just above the building top level.  it had several white circles on the bottom of it, but they were not illuminated.  the object was completely without lights.  it was moving very slowly and actually crossed the strip.  we were in the vicinity of the mirage hotel.  it made no noise at all that we could hear.  i have never seen a flying object move so slowly - or this size - it was very large.  to this day we still do not know what it was.
content.summary: Triangle shaped ufo passed directly overhead slowly just above building level

content.detailedDescription: At about 10:45pm on june 11, 2008, i looked out of the window and saw what appeared to be a blinking star. i was right in the middle of houston looking east. the light didn't look hazy as if it were blinking because of clouds passing by, it continued to look bright. i also noticed it seemed to be changing color. i asked my brother and my girlfriend to come out to see it, and everybody, including me, thought it could have possibly been the lights on an airplane. but as time went by, maybe 5 min or so later, the lights were in the same approximate point in the sky and also didn't seem to be any closer. also, it didn't look to be clear red and green, it looked like a mixture of colors, constantly changing. we got some very cheap binoculars. i looked at it again, and this time we could see a little better. i couldn't see what the light was, but i could definitely see that it was moving very fast. it didn't seem to be traveling anywhere, it looked like it was doing all kinds of crazy patterns in the air, never leaving the same area. and it definitely wasn't just red and green, it was changing colors like crazy, every color imaginable. we all saw it for at least 20 min, i can only say that long because i was leaving, but it was still in the same place in the sky when i left, so i really don't know if or when it went away. i can't see the sky in that direction from my apartment.
content.summary: Distant light(s) dancing around weird patterns, changing color

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv because i couldn't sleep and we live on the lake and have big windows facing the lake.  i usually see nothing in the sky because we have a number of trees in the yard.  but tonight i couldn't help but notice this bright star looking light.  it caught my attention because i had never noticed it before.  i got up and went to the window and looked closer and could swear it was getting bigger as if it were coming my direction and it was pulsating.  i went outside for a better look, but the trees were blocking my view.  i decided to just go back to my show and take a gander every once in a while to see if i could tell for sure it was moving.  i could.  so, to be sure my eyes were not playing tricks on me, i laid my head against the back of the sofa in a crack and placed one hand over one eye and used a point of reference (shingles).  my eyes were not playing tricks on me, after a while that was very apparent.  it is still out there but now it has moved up down and left shining through 3 separate windows and once i knew for sure it was not my eyes playing tricks i haven't moved until i got up to report this.  i noticed it at 11:40 am and got up to report this at 12:45 am.
content.summary: Bright star moving around all over the place - at times looked like two it jetted around so quick.  changed from bright to dim over and over (pulsating or light revolving).
